name: Snakes-and-ladders
tagline: A simple snake and ladder logic game build with angular js
body:
### Snakes And Ladders

A simple snake and ladder logic game build with angular js. The game can be either played single or with two players.


### DEMO

Click [here](http://harshitakasera.com/projects/snl/game) to see a working demo of the game.


### Version

Beta Release


### Contact

Please contact hkasera5@live.com for suggestions or feedback.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
